TopicTitle: Black sky and sea surface gone after time warping

Articles.Content:
So I built my 1950s style mixed powed (turbojet + rocket) airplane

Rolled out at night so I warped until morning while on runway

After sunrise, the sky remained black and sea surface was gone. When tried to splash down the altimeter went briefly  below zero and then to 2000+ meters. The plane continued descent and landed ALMOST intact on the seabottom.

https://1drv.ms/u/s!ArurAfp8kVPpfoGisdWtwN39lWU?e=aCdPbS
